text: Kibzaim with its pasture lands, and Beth-horon with its pasture lands.
But there were no provisions in the storerooms, because it was the seventh year, and the reserves had been eaten up by those who had been rescued from the Gentiles and brought to Judea.
They neither vindicate their own rights, nor do they rescue anyone wronged, for they are powerless.
The Healings at Gennesaret. After making the crossing, they came to land at Gennesaret and tied up there.
Jesus said to them, â€œAmen, amen, I say to you, unless you eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink his blood, you do not have life within you.
